text: The 28th TVyNovelas Awards is an Academy of special awards to the best of soap operas and TV shows. The awards ceremony took place on March 14, 2010 in the Forum Mundo Imperial, Acapulco, Guerrero. The ceremony was televised in the Mexico by Canal de las estrellas. Yuri hosted the show. Sortilegio and Atrévete a soñar won 4 awards, the most for the evening. Other winners Hasta que el dinero nos separe won 3 awards including Best Telenovela of the Year, En nombre del amor won 2 awards and Mi pecado, Mañana es para siempre, Un gancho al corazón and Los exitosos Pérez won one each. == Summary of awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin:1em auto;" !
